column1: On behalf of the Appellant the following Grounds of Appeal are raised.

column2: 1.  The  Learned  High  Court  Judge  has  totally  disregarded  the  fact  that
PW4  had  a  motive  to  induce  PW1  to  fabricate  a  false  allegation
inconsistent evidence to convict the Appellant.
